sourcesContent:
import github_logo from "./assets/icons8-github-48 (1).png"; import linkedin_logo from "./assets/icons8-linkedin-48.png" import flickr_logo from "./assets/flickr-icon.svg" const aboutme = `

Hi there! I'm a third-year engineering student who really loves technology. I'm always excited to check out the latest tech trends and try them out for myself. Coding is more than just a skill for me; it's something I genuinely enjoy. Aside from that, I love listening to music, clicking photos and keeping active by going to the gym.


I learn new things pretty quickly. So, if there's a new technology or skill needed for a job,
I'm ready to dive in and learn. My main goal is to use my skills to help both myself and
any company I work with grow and succeed.


To sum it up, I'm a tech enthusiast who's always ready to learn and help. Whether it's with
coding, new tech, or any other challenge, I'm here to give it my best.

` const logos = [ { name: "linkedin", src: linkedin_logo, alt: "linkedin logo", link: "https://www.linkedin.com/in/sarangnambiar", }, { name: "github", src: github_logo, alt: "github logo", link: "https://github.com/Sarang-Nambiar", }, { name: "flickr", src: flickr_logo, alt: "flickr logo", link: "https://flic.kr/ps/3eAW9G", }, ]; const projects = [{ name: "Hotel Booking Website", description: "This is a project", img: "https://images.pexels.com/photos/147411/italy-mountains-dawn-daybreak-147411.jpeg?cs=srgb&dl=pexels-pixabay-147411.jpg&fm=jpg", alt: "project 1", stack: ["React", "Tailwind", "Firebase"], date: "2021-01-01" }, { name: "Sequence modelling for sentiment analysis", description: "This is a project", img: "https://images.pexels.com/photos/147411/italy-mountains-dawn-daybreak-147411.jpeg?cs=srgb&dl=pexels-pixabay-147411.jpg&fm=jpg", alt: "project 3", stack: ["React", "Tailwind", "Firebase"], date: "2021-01-01" }, { name: "Travel Planner Using Generative AI", description: "This is a project", img: "https://images.pexels.com/photos/147411/italy-mountains-dawn-daybreak-147411.jpeg?cs=srgb&dl=pexels-pixabay-147411.jpg&fm=jpg", alt: "project 2", stack: ["React", "Tailwind", "Firebase"], date: "2021-01-01" }, { name: "OccupEYE", description: "This is a project", img: "https://images.pexels.com/photos/147411/italy-mountains-dawn-daybreak-147411.jpeg?cs=srgb&dl=pexels-pixabay-147411.jpg&fm=jpg", alt: "project 3", stack: ["React", "Tailwind", "Firebase"], date: "2021-01-01" }, { name: "CooKit(TikTok Youth Camp)", description: "This is a project", img: "https://images.pexels.com/photos/147411/italy-mountains-dawn-daybreak-147411.jpeg?cs=srgb&dl=pexels-pixabay-147411.jpg&fm=jpg", alt: "project 3", stack: ["React", "Tailwind", "Firebase"], date: "2021-01-01" }, { name: "Empathy Game", description: "This is a project", img: "https://images.pexels.com/photos/147411/italy-mountains-dawn-daybreak-147411.jpeg?cs=srgb&dl=pexels-pixabay-147411.jpg&fm=jpg", alt: "project 3", stack: ["React", "Tailwind", "Firebase"], date: "2021-01-01" }, ] export { logos, projects, aboutme };
